## Normal distribution

```{r, echo = FALSE}
sliderInput("bins", "Number of bins:", min = 1, max = 50, value = 30)

renderPlot({
  x <- faithful[, 2]  # Old Faithful Geyser data
  bins <- seq(min(x), max(x), length.out = input$bins + 1)

  # draw the histogram with the specified number of bins
  hist(x, breaks = bins, col = 'darkgray', border = 'white')
})
```


```{r PDF, echo = FALSE, fig.margin = TRUE, fig.cap = "Boxplot and probability density function of a normal distribution *N*(0, Ïƒ^2^). Credit: [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Probability_density_function)"}
knitr::include_graphics("figures/Boxplot_vs_PDF.svg")
```
